gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 131, Suns 122
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Suns, 131-122. Paul George (33 points) and Kawhi Leonard (30 points, eight rebounds) combined for 63 points for the Clippers in the victory, while Devin Booker tallied 35 points (5-8 3PT FG) and six assists for the Suns in the losing effort. The Clippers have won four consecutive games as they improve to 21-12 on the season, while the Suns snap a 4-game winning streak and fall to 18-16.
